work.text: You will find some samples of my work just below. I am an experienced writer who has written magazine articles, personal opinion articles, literary criticism, social media articles, and reviews about films, tv shows and restaurants. Besides, I am a Community Manager and I have worked for two different business. Although the most of my reviews are written in Spanish, I am able to write in English as well.

aboutMe.text: Creative, dreamer, nomad, sensitive, sympathetic or friendly are with no doubt some adjectives that it can describe me pretty well. Even though, I really think that it could be too brave try to describe a person with only some words. I'm feelings, I'm thoughts, I'm memories, I'm failures, I'm succeess... All of us are. * The point of maximum danger is the point of least fear *

contact.text: If you would like further information about my work or myself, please don't hesitate to contact me through the form below. I am looking forward to hearing from you. Many thanks.
